revised_title: Royal Society Awardees and Accomplishments in 1971
tldr: This article from the Royal Society's Notes and Records highlights the accomplishments and awards given to various scientists in 1971. Notable recipients include Norman Wingate Pirie, Gerhard Herzberg, Max Ferdinand Perutz, and many others. The article also includes obituaries for several members of the society.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science
